title: Robotica, Curious Adversary

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Autonomous Drone Strike** — Send a fleet of drones to attack another player. This is an Astral ability, since you're not the one carrying out the attack. Investigative results on your target will only see that they were visited by drones.
**Robot Overlord** — Remove a player from the game tonight and for the following day. (see 1305)
**Captcha Fail** — Choose a faction. A randomly selected player not from that faction will fail a captcha test, which converts them to a random role in that faction. This ability fails if the faction you choose isn't already in the game.
**Mech Suit** — Revive yourself, then join an evil faction of your choice. You may only use this ability twice, but you may use it whether you're alive or dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each of your abilities has a one-night cooldown.
- Whenever you join a faction, you gain an additional ability based on that faction, which the host decides. (see 776)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all that would oppose you, or gain the win condition of the evil faction you join with your Mech Suit ability.
